short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Studio Capture is a tool that allows you to create items from images and descriptions that you capture from any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Studio Capture is Studio Designer's proprietary web browser tool. Users can digitally source products from any vendor's site to populates item details such as product descriptions, dimensions and pricing, directly into Studio Designer. Capture, track, and manage hundreds of details on an unlimited number of projects â€” powered by an item-based integrated system built for your business. Instantly collect product details from vendor websites, and quickly create items to propose, invoice, and order in just a few clicks.
